level.text: The per diem rate to be charged for skilled care patients at District of Columbia Village shall be $82.50.
The per diem rate to be charged for intermediate care patients at District of Columbia Village shall be $56.00.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-82, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2702.
For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-24, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2713.
